places.name: Rajwada Palace
places.description: A grand palace showcasing Mughal, Maratha, and French architectural styles.

places.name: Lal Bagh Palace
places.description: A beautiful palace built by the Holkar dynasty, now a museum.

places.name: Khajrana Ganesh Temple
places.description: A famous temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha, built by Rani Ahilyabai Holkar.

places.name: Sarafa Bazaar
places.description: A vibrant market known for its jewelry and delicious street food.

places.name: Patalpani Waterfall
places.description: A scenic waterfall located about 25 km from Indore, perfect for a day trip.

places.name: Annapurna Temple
places.description: A beautiful temple dedicated to Goddess Annapurna.

places.name: Indore Museum
places.description: A museum showcasing artifacts from the prehistoric era to modern times.

places.name: Wagle Bus Depot
places.description: A major bus terminal in Indore.
